Hi, I am Charles currently A 21-year old 3rd-Year Bachelor of science in computer science student based in Cabuyao, Laguna Philippines.

I'm the developer of The Lost Hospital. I work on projects including websites, 3D third person & first person games, web and graphic design, unreal engine basic tutorial blogs, and code tutorials.

Frontend Development I got this skills when I was grade 11, I've learned about the fundamentals of frontend development and start making websites.

Backend Development I have knowledge about the fundamentals of backend, I develop basic applications with Java

When I'm not writing code, I enjoy reading and learning about technologies, I share the things I've learned through short videos on my blog.
